abstract.p: Pennsylvania operates Web site, www.hauntedpa.com, listing Halloween events, ghost tours and location of famous persons' gravesites (S)

block.p: To paraphrase a tourism slogan now defunct, ''You've Got a Fiend in Pennsylvania.'' And to make those devils, ghosts and other scary creatures easier to find, the state operates a Web site, www.hauntedpa .com, listing Halloween events, ghost tours and the location of famous persons' gravesites, among other things. Stephen Foster, for example, is buried in Allegheny Cemetery in Pittsburgh, not far from St. John the Baptist Catholic Cemetery, resting place of Andy Warhol. ''Ghoulish Getaways'' includes a listing of bed-and-breakfasts that are supposedly haunted.
